options.code: return {responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, interaction: {intersect: false, mode: 'index'}, plugins: {legend: {position: 'top', labels: {usePointStyle: true, padding: 20, font: {size: 14}}}, tooltip: {backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)', titleColor: '#1e293b', bodyColor: '#1e293b', borderColor: '#e2e8f0', borderWidth: 1, padding: 12, displayColors: true}}, scales: {x: {grid: {display: false}, ticks: {font: {size: 12}}}, y: {beginAtZero: true, grid: {color: '#f1f5f9'}, ticks: {font: {size: 12}}}}}

return {responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, plugins: {legend: {position: 'right', labels: {usePointStyle: true, padding: 20, font: {size: 14}}}, tooltip: {backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)', titleColor: '#1e293b', bodyColor: '#1e293b', borderColor: '#e2e8f0', borderWidth: 1, padding: 12, displayColors: true, callbacks: {label: function(context) {const dataArray = context.chart.data.datasets[0].data; const total = dataArray.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0); const percentage = ((context.parsed / total) * 100).toFixed(1); return context.label + ': ' + percentage + '%';}}}, datalabels: {color: '#ffffff', font: {weight: 'bold', size: 14}, formatter: function(value, ctx) {const dataArray = ctx.chart.data.datasets[0].data; const total = dataArray.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0); const percentage = ((value / total) * 100).toFixed(0); return percentage + '%';}}}}
